items.preText: 4pm Cheers, Sreshth. This is Deivarayan Muthu with you. There's no place like home. Two left-arm spinners opened the bowling for Bangladesh with Shakib returning 3 for 43 to limit Zimbabwe to 170. Tamim has a new opening partner is Anamul, who is playing his first ODI since the 2015 World Cup. Zimbabwe huddle up near the edge of the boundary. Jarvis takes the new ball for the tourists Sanyat11: "In last few years, pace bowlers were the key to the success or failure for BD. Good to see the pacers are enjoying their bowling again. Hope this rhythm goes over the year. " Pritam Saha: ""Two ducks at the top, and despite a bit of a resistance in the middle overs, Zimbabwe were all out for 170 with more than two overs to go." Jasim UDDIN: "Looks like second coming for Fizz after injury. "
items.text: good length, shapes to angle away but nibbles in a touch, defended gingerly to the midwicket region
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: floated full and slanting away outside off with the angle, no shot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: even fuller and wider outside off, off-side wide, as Tamim ushers it through to Taylor
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.preText: Irfan: "171 is a good target,but it can turn into a bridge too far due to overconfidence. I believe Zimbabwean bowlers will try to fight back,but best of luck to Bangladesh."
items.text: full and straight, Tamim presses forward and pokes an outside edge to backward point. Hint of away movement for Jarvis
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: explodes from a length outside off, gets really big on Tamim, who stabs a single past the slip cordon to third man
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: Anamul marks his return to the ODI fold with a crisp drive straight of mid-on. He stretches out, meets the pitch, and executes the perfect on drive
items.shortText: Jarvis to Anamul Haque, FOUR runs

items.text: glanced off the pads to fine leg
items.shortText: Jarvis to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: ooooh, that's super stylish from Anamul. Sprayed full on the pads, he presses forward, picks it up and whips it with the wrists over square leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Anamul Haque, FOUR runs

items.text: short, wide, fetch that! Anamul sizes it up and cracks it away to the cover boundary. To add to Zimbabwe's woes, that's a front-foot no-ball
items.shortText: Chatara to Anamul Haque, (no ball) FOUR runs

items.text: full and angling in towards middle and leg, Anamul is early into his leg-side swipe, drags an inside edge to deep square leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: jumps from a length and pings the glove. Tamim loosens his grip and fends it off to the off side
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: darted full on the pads, picked off easily behind square on the leg side. Cremer slips in the deep
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: full and angling away outside off, too full to be honest, Tamim stretches out and caresses a square-drive. The ball rolls away to the boundary
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: good length and slanting away outside off, Tamim quietly tucks his bat inside the line
items.shortText: Chatara to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length, moves away outside off, skirts past the outside edge. Jarvis found extra bounce too
items.shortText: Jarvis to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: pitched up and outside off, forward and drilled back to Jarvis, the ball bursts out of his hands
items.shortText: Jarvis to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: fullish and on off, Anamul manipulates a single to mid-on with the wrists
items.shortText: Jarvis to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.preText: Zimbabwe could do well to add one more slip
items.text: sliding into off stump, jabbed into the covers
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to the right of Mire at mid-off
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length on a fourth-stump line, Anamul deploys a solid stride and defends it to the off side
items.shortText: Jarvis to Anamul Haque, no run

items.preText: Raza will bowl offbreaks with the new ball. Over the wicket
items.text: skids on full outside off, the new ball usually skids on, tapped down to long-off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: non-turning offbreak on off stump, Anamul attacks it with a ferocious slog-sweep. He stretches out and hits it with the intended break over square leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Anamul Haque, FOUR runs

items.text: offbreak, turns in on off, tapped to the leg side with soft hands this time
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: fast slider, jabbed to midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: slides in at 88.3ks and hits the pad, but this was heading down the leg side with the sharp angle
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Anamul Haque, no run
